data.title: Jan Troell and Peter Cowie on HERE IS YOUR LIFE
data.meta_description: In this conversation, Jan Troell, the cowriter, director, cinematographer, and editor of HERE IS YOUR LIFE, discusses his beginnings in film and working methods with film historian Peter Cowie. It was recorded at Troell’s home in Sweden in March 2015.
data.text: In this conversation, Jan Troell, the cowriter, director, cinematographer, and editor of HERE IS YOUR LIFE, discusses his beginnings in film and working methods with film historian Peter Cowie. It was recorded at Troell’s home in Sweden in March 2015.
